description: Sent when the device generated a syslog message that has
the right severity level. This severity level is set by
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogSeverityNotification COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgNumber u 9999 COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgFacility s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgSeverity i 1 COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgText s EXAMPLE

description: A unique ID representing a message in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgNumber

description: A string representing the facility that sent the message.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgFacility

description: The severity level of the message in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgSeverity

description: The message itself as logged in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgText

description: Sent when the device generated a syslog message that
matches the regular expression specified in
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogRegExMatchNotification COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgNumber u 9999 COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgFacility s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgSeverity i 1 COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgText s EXAMPLE

description: A unique ID representing a message in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgNumber

description: A string representing the facility that sent the message.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgFacility

description: The severity level of the message in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgSeverity

description: The message itself as logged in the system log.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSLOG-MIB::syslogMsgText
